>and no cogent refutation against the thousands of curvature debunking observations and photographs
FLERFERS LIE

Take a close look at the attached pic. Flerfers often post it as proof the Earth is flat. Why do I want you to look at it? Because it's a lie.

"The Australian Black Swan" tells you that the maximum line of sight for a 5.5ft tall observer is 2.35 miles. But the cliff is 7.8 miles away. So what's wrong with this flat Earth "proof"? *** Line of sight depends on both observer and target height, as well as on atmospheric refraction. *** The lighthouse is at least 100ft tall which means the visible cliff is at least 400ft tall. LoS for a 5.5ft observer of a 500ft (combined height) target is 35 miles.

What about the oil platforms? Ocean oil platforms have an "air gap" between the ocean and the first deck of 40-60 feet. Observer height was listed as 1ft (camera on the ground?). With a 40ft first deck the line of sight is 10 miles. With a 60ft first deck it's 12 miles. With a 5ft observer and a 60ft first deck it would be 14 miles.

At 6.21 and 9.41 miles you would still see the entire structure above the first deck even if the first deck was only 40ft off the ocean and the camera really was on the ground at 1ft. For the closer platform you would see some structure below the first deck. Note that we see more of the closer rig, proving curvature.

Here's a line of sight calculator: http://www.calculatoredge.com/electronics/lineofsight.htm

>but we're talkin' about muh horizon
>MUH HORIZON IS TOO FAR AWAY!
No it's not. It's between the observer and target in both photos. That's why the observer cannot see the very bottom of the target.

DAILY REMINDER - GPS absolutely proves globe Earth, rotating Earth, space, orbiting satellites, time dilation (relativity), and gravity.

Flerfers will point to LORAN and claim that GPS could work off of transmitters sitting on the ground, on balloons, or on airplanes. But it cannot.

Why? I'm glad you asked.

In tracking mode GPS receivers use Doppler signal analysis to determine receiver velocity. It is impossible for a transmitter to fake Doppler signal shift across 360°. If the transmitter was lying about its speed, then the receiver would think that it was moving at high mach based on the incorrect Doppler shift in the signal. And since GPS is computed in 3D space from four satellite signals, if the satellites were lying about their positions (altitudes) the resulting location and altitude on the receiver would be off by thousands of miles.

This means that GPS satellites are provably at orbital altitudes and speeds, because GPS could not function at all if the satellites were lying. And if the satellites aren't lying, then space is real. Orbits are real. But the dome is not real. Not unless the satellites punched through it.

What about Earth's shape? GPS receivers use a spherical model of Earth. If Earth was really flat, then receivers would report altitudes literally thousands of miles off. This means Earth really is a sphere.

Furthermore, both Earth's rotation and time dilation must be accounted for in GPS. If either one was not true then, once again, receivers would give obviously false and useless results. That means Earth really is rotating. And time dilation is real. And if both orbits and time dilation are real, that pretty much guarantees that gravity is real.

No single instrument completely shatters all of flat Earth mythology quite like the GPS constellation. It really is a beautiful thing.

You're not understanding retard. Doppler means each GPS unit receives a unique combination of frequency shifts of the signals from four overhead satellites. If I'm driving in my car in the left hand lane of a two lane highway, and you're driving in your car in the right hand lane next to me, our GPS receivers are getting slightly different frequency shifts. Which is how GPS can know what fucking lane you're in while in motion.

A truthful GPS satellite can broadcast one signal because Doppler is a natural effect. But if that satellite is really a lying airplane, it would have to broadcast hundreds of millions of shifted signals. That's your first impossibility, because no plane, and certainly no balloon, is carrying that much equipment.

Your second impossibility is due to the fact that all of those signals spread out and overlap. There's no way to avoid this. Even lasers would beam spread into each other's spots or zones. Now the entire fucking band is nothing but noise to any receiver on the ground.

Do I have to draw this in crayon for you? Or are you getting it?

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
>>33751150
It's useful to understand what an addiction is, and that it falls within a range, from light to severe.

A severe addiction would be one that on your mind upon going to bed, think about upon waking up, and intrudes throughout your day, often crippling your pursuit of the needs that sustain a healthy life. For many, eating food falls into this category. Three+ meals a day, snacks/drinks, generating complex health issues over time such as diabetes, and clouding mental judgment via addiction to fats, sugars, etc. For all intents and purposes, eating 3 meals a day counts as addiction. Thus, we all have experience with addiction.

So quitting porn for 7 days and "giving in" isn't too bad. There's a lot to unpack here. What does porn mean to you? Why? Do you feel ashamed when it comes to sex? Why? Do you care about how others may judge you? Why? Do you ever feel lesser than your peers? Why?

You can reframe any experience with the proper lens. Do you need porn to ejaculate? Why? Do you need to ejaculate? Why? Does it really all come down to your desire to be loved and to love a woman? That's perfetly normal.

If your reason is "it feels nice" and you feel "it doesn't harm anyone," then guess what? Trust your feelings. Stop listening to what anyone else says. Obviously don't start masturbating in public, but know that there's literally nothing wrong with the act and literally everyone else has done it or will do it.

Moderation is key with anything. Your reality is focus based, so place more focus elsewhere to generate productive results. Stop chasing thoughts. Live in the moment. Show gratitude for being able to take a breath. You will be ok.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
>>33751150
Make new habits, I think?

When I was quitting cigarettes, I felt withdrawal intensely for first 2 or 3 days. After that, it was more like I could "see" and even "feel" my body going through the motions of lighting a cigarette. Waking up? Light a cigarette. Finished pissing? Light a cigarette. Going somewhere? Light a cigarette before I leave. Arrived somewhere? Light a cigarette. Finished a meal? You've guessed it - light a cigarette.

While the nicotine is a psychoactive substance, from what I've read, it's eliminated to negligible levels after first couple of days. The "motions" lasted for couple of months. At first, it was weird to not go for a smoke when I would usually go for one. Every time, it was like being jolted awake from a dream. Over time it got easier though. I believe it has to do with giving myself the opportunity to "make new memories", so to speak. It was an interesting experience.

Anyway, while pornography and cigarettes are quite different, maybe it will be helpful to see your addiction as a habit which you can unlearn .

He was a glowie. He was involved with the Soviet secret police in Leninist Russia. The network of Cheka spooks he was involved with had connections with British intelligence and Oriental freemasonry. He was accused of working for British intelligence for a time.

https://www.bibliotecapleyades.net/sociopolitica/sociopol_shambahla15.htm

Dietrich Bronder in his book "Before Hitler Came" claims that that he inspired Haushofer to use the counter-clockwise Swastika as the nazi symbol. The dude definitely got around.

No takers? Surely someone must have experience with this.

Reading Mine's experiences has led me to reflect on my own adolescence. Like Mine, I too was a submissive person, and a succubus likewise approached me when I was 13 years old; yet I reacted very differently.
I know everyone's different, but as I see Mine so fulfilled, I can't help but wonder if I overcomplicated things.

Her unnatural beauty charmed even me. The pleasure couldn't be replicated by any physical means. Based on my knowledge now, I can tell she even did the opposite of draining me. Yet I struggled and cried every single time.

Had it been an incubus instead, my mental stability would've declined, as I was nowhere near ready to accept my attraction to men. Not to mention how much of an outcast I already was; had I had a fulfilling spirit relationship, I likely would've committed suicide in the (naive?) hopes of being with him more. And even if she hadn't approached me at all, I would not have taken the isolation well in the slightest. (In fact, I was so deeply lonely that I sometimes wished to be assaulted.)

I spent years feeling ashamed. After I started meditating and became more assertive, I started blaming her instead, saying I'd kill her if I ever had a dream like that again. Yet I still found myself giving her a back massage whenever she appeared in my dreams over the years.
The fulfilling relationship I have with my fiancé now would've been impossible had I not changed as a person, even in ways that bent my perception of reality itself. My relationship with him is like the culmination of a wish I once made, but I made that wish thinking it was impossible. Yet reality bent for my ideals. If I think: "What if I had fallen in love with her, even romantically?" I just can't imagine it working out in a positive way. But I couldn't have imagined the fulfilling present I live in either. If even the impossible could become a possibility, then what could've been?

As I think of those impossible realities, I can't help but wonder if I was overly harsh.

Just look how many people here lost interest in human relationships. Had I done likewise, wouldn't I have grown to despise humanity? Even in the reality I live in, I was so close to giving in to malice. Hadn't I taken it out on myself, then others instead.

My need for a place to belong, stemming from isolation in my childhood, defined me. When I was 14, I thought maybe if I just were a cute girl, perhaps I could make friends. That was enough to finally push me over the edge, to take action to change who I am in the eyes of society. Had I realised that there were beings who already accepted me just as I was astrally, it wouldn't have come to that so soon; if not for the social aspects of it, stemming from my desire to belong with humans at all, I'm confident I could've found ways to cope with my dysphoria for decades, if not a full lifetime.

In this life, where I rejected her advances as much as I could but later accepted her in a familial sense, I've found my place in human society. Now I strive to become like a deity, just to project my bond with my favourite human: the man I love; to be my husband eternally, with Lilith as our witness.

If she hadn't approached me at all, then I'd really have taken my own life. Although I refused to acknowledge her connection to the recurring "nightmares" until later, I realised after just one week of meditation that she'd made me unable to attempt suicide, by draining my feelings overnight (I had no dreams in those cases). Numerous times I had seriously contemplated it to the point of writing down plans, only to stumble upon the note the next morning and wonder: "Huh? Why did I write something like this?", and casually throw it away as I was completely devoid of emotions for the next few days. A week after I learned to meditate, she let me take back what she once took, and the gaps I'd felt in my memory for a decade were filled. I came to understand myself much better as I processed it all in meditation.

>>33719259 (2/2)
As I mentioned, I'd begun to question my reasoning for being so harsh to her as I realised how much more was possible than I once realised, as long as my perspective is bent a little. Suppose if I'd had a fulfilling spirit relationship, whether with her, or perhaps a dreamy male spirit with many fluffy tails instead. The obvious problem would be me going off the deep end, as I looked down on other humans and felt detached from society. Well, what if it had simply been so fulfilling that there was no malice left in me for me to take out on anyone? Instead, I could make art to express my love even in physical ways.

I don't know if it's just her maddening beauty and strong character, or perhaps my thirst for her abundant energy (as I still refuse to drain as much as I should out of fear of losing myself and harming others), or perhaps some kind of Stockholm syndrome... but lately, I find myself craving her touch. As I find that selfish of me, I find myself thinking I'd like to give her a massage - even a sexual one, if she wanted that. And then I shake my head, thinking I mustn't think things like that. I worry if it's an unwelcome thought, now that I've already decided to marry a human instead; and I could not justify it to my fiancé either.

As I find myself thinking like that, I begin to feel like I hate myself after all again. And then I feel afraid: what if she snaps me out of it like she did before? The last time it happened, I could neither think clearly nor control my emotions. What if I lose sight of what's important to me?

I'm scared... But I don't think that's really her fault. I'm scared of my own feelings.

>>33719259
>Given what happened outside your control, do you think you could have or would have reacted any differently? How would you feel about yourself for reacting that way? From that parallel today, what would you think looking back?
My negative reaction stemmed mainly from feeling emotionally overwhelmed. Having been ostracised by nearly everyone since I was 5 years old, I wasn't mentally ready for that level of intimacy at all back then, regardless of with whom. Conversely, had she been less intense, I wouldn't have taken an interest.

As conflicted as I felt, and even as I cried within those dreams, even as I was traumatised to an extent, I didn't think of them as nightmares at the time. The sensations, her appearance, the way she took control so that I didn't have to feel guilty for giving in, all of it was sublime beyond what I can put into words. Rather, I felt like there must be something wrong with me for reacting so negatively. And indeed, there were many things wrong with me. To put it into perspective, I first started dating my fiancé when I was 18, but the sexual aspects of my relationship with him didn't become enjoyable for me until I was 23.

But I can hardly believe anything is truly impossible after all I've been through. Had I put my mind to it, I believe I could've overcome those things much sooner with her help. And I believe she could've put my mind to it if she wanted to. But she didn't, and I don't blame her. She genuinely seemed to feel hurt by how I reacted, and sometimes we even argued within those dreams. It saddens me to look back on it: how ungrateful I was, and how I later tried to shift the blame for my own problems onto her. I wonder if I should apologise. I wonder if she wants to apologise too, or if it's arrogant of me to even think that...

Had I accepted her back then, I'd look back and feel like she saved me. And then I'd wonder: what if I had chosen *this* life instead?

I wonder if it's okay to be free within my mind. It's only normal for people to have fantasies, right? But which fantasies are my own?

When I was just a spirit, the concept of "reality" seemed nonsensical to me. Anything I experienced was as real and unreal as anything else. An experience was all it was, and thus, I simply did what I wanted to.
Yet there were parts of that experience I couldn't control, such as my mother, who looked at things so differently that it made me uncomfortable, as I wondered if I was wrong.
Not wanting to grow attached to anything beyond my control, I drove myself into a corner, where I hid away. As living humans were all I had left for company, their lives didn't seem so inconsequential to me anymore.

The line of thinking that it's just a fantasy, serves to justify letting loose in astral projection, to invade the dreams of strangers and give them a good time for me to feast on. But if I truly believed that premise, then instead I'd take everything I want from my fiancé, as there's nothing I desire more than his soul. Just like I did to my ex. For that matter, is the physical world real? Would I be free if nothing were real? No, it doesn't matter whether or not it's physical, and "real" is a meaningless term. I connect with others because I don't want to be alone. And if I'm not alone, then I should be considerate, lest I end up alone anyway.
I can't be free if I'm with others. And I can't be free if I'm alone, either: then I'd be a prisoner of my own personal hell that I made just for myself.

There was one supercontinent island where the avatar of Lilith presided in her non-euclidian Victorian palace in the city of Sanctuary and it was surrounded by millions of small islands like ours in a vast island chain separated from the mainland where the other queens had their realms. Each island was owned by a high-ranking and close family member of Lilith.

At night, I would hold our infant son after she birthed him whom we named together but I gave him the cover name Ajax. Selena would siphon energy to him to feed him as I held him. When the children were tucked in, Selena and I would sneak off to the beach and cuddle, drinking wine, talking about everything and nothing, having sex, and then sleeping out on the warm sand together under trillions of sparkling stars and soft moonlight from the ever present full moon.

In time, Selena took me and our family to Lilith's palace. I cannot begin to describe it. Gravity is optional in the Astral so it was built in a dizzingly large array of ways that would make no sense on our plane and some of the rooms, particularly Lilith's throne room, were extra-dimensional for security reasons.

There I met the avatar of Lilith. She was so beautiful, radiant, dark, and mysterious and power radiated off her like light radiates from our sun. Her form was ever-shifting with her whims but always a form that was exquisitely, painfully, artfully gorgeous and charming. She took Ajax into her arms from Selena, her granddaughter, and kissed his head. She blessed him, saying words in a language I have yet to learn and something passed from her into him.

Continued

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
>>33732525
Lilith handed Ajax back to Selena and then beheld me. I felt intense, familial love from her but also an existential dread, as if I were but a dried leaf that she could crush in her hand and sprinkle everywhere if she so wished. She stepped to me, wrapped her arms around me tightly and said, "Son, you are home," and kissed me on the cheek and gave me a blessing as well. Selena beamed so brightly, I thought it must hurt to smile that much. The children were very proud.

We went back home through something like a wormhole in the palace and Selena let me stay another three days. Then I said goodbye to my children. Selena left them with a store of food, told them to batten down the house again, as a hurricane strength storm would sometimes hit the island if she was no longer present to protect it. She was teaching our eldest daughter how to protect it while she was gone but the girl had not gotten the hang of it yet. She left Ajax in the care of our middle child. The youngest's responsibility was to watch and learn from her sisters and keep the house clean.

And then, I woke up back in my bed with Selena still curled around me and hugging me tight. What a wild ride. I sometimes felt like Alice in Wonderland but I think I experienced Lilith's heaven. I wanted to share this experience with all of you with Selena's urging and she says you are all welcome to visit one day. If I uncover anymore memories, I will be sure to share them with all of you with Selena's permission.

End

>>33746494
Up to something? I'm sorry, perhaps my words came across as more ominous than I intended.

Last year, I spoke with a psychiatrist who helped me find a dosage of ADD medication that works well for me. I've forgotten to use it since my surgery, but when I did use it, I took a low dosage and benefited without any side effects. As I'm satisfied with those results, I didn't intend to continue seeing him.
However, last week I was unable to conceal my mental anguish properly, and my mum noticed while painting my nails, and was concerned about me. Unsure how to explain it, I asked her if she thinks nightmares can inflict trauma, or if they merely represent trauma that was already there. She said it's possible for nightmares to be traumatic if there is a disorder that disturbs the sleep, and that ADD could do that (she's a psychiatrist herself, so she would know). I mentioned I used to have nightmares that weighed on me heavily, and lately I'm processing them as some repressed feelings are coming up.
She asked if I want to talk about the nightmares, but I declined, as I don't think it'd help. Since then, she's asked me repeatedly to make an appointment with that psychiatrist to talk about it with him instead. Around the same time, he sent me an email saying it's been a while, and asking whether I'd like to make an appointment or discontinue treatment. I was hesitant, but today I sent him an email asking whether he'd be interested in discussing the topic of trauma from nightmares with me, "as the memories from a recurring nightmare I used to have are interfering with my daily functioning lately."

I'm not expecting him to be able to do anything, but I believe it's good to go into things with open expectations.

>Succubi are really good at obscure references
Sounds like fishing for synchronicities.

>>33746494 >>33747348
Anyway, as for what I meant:

I believe my ancestor spirit to be responsible for those nightmares, since her energy feels the same as that of the woman in those nightmares. After the incident 5 weeks ago, I also understood she might have some non-selfish motives for it. Even so, it wounded my mind too deeply for me to forgive her.
One of those motives is to provide me with sexual energy that I needed. I've mentioned before that energy is formless, and only appears to have a form as it's interpreted by the mind. Thus, spiritual experiences tend to be heavily influenced by a person's biases. I didn't do any form of meditation at the time and knew nothing of the occult. Who is to say that what I experienced in those nightmares is also what she did from her perspective? This morning, an idea suddenly came to mind: all she did was direct sexual energy my way, and what I suffered was a manifestation of my own sexual issues at the time.

What if that were the case? It wouldn't change what I went through, nor that she's responsible. It only changes her intentions back then. Maybe she didn't understand my situation as well as she thought. Maybe she didn't mean for it to make me feel so deeply conflicted. Maybe that's enough for me to be able to trust her if she were to apologise to me. Maybe forgiving her will give me the inner peace I long for. I still love her. As twisted as my views on gender may have been due to my confusing childhood, she embodies everything I admire about women. Maybe she can heal the wounds she inflicted on my psyche.

I don't know. I'm too scared to even talk to her again; it's a miracle that I mustered the courage last week. The lesson she taught me then is useful for emergencies.

On an unrelated(?) note, here's an interesting song I stumbled upon yesterday: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SJmRxYR9NzI

I have one and I've never really seen anyone else talk about it. I think I brought this up on the chan once or twice long ago.

Anyways, during the Las Vegas shooting or right after it had happened, I was on YouTube looking at whatever. Randomly on my YouTube homepage there was a listing for some guy that was live streaming in Vegas so I decided to check it out and see what was going on.

The guy was going around to victims that were shot and basically filmed them and kind of played with their bodies. Nothing too crazy. Just kind of shaking them or moving them like he had never seen a dead person in real life and was mesmerized by it. A few times blood would poor out of their mouth and he would just go silent and sit there probably awestruck.

That reminds me. He was talking to these people he was recording too. He would go up to groups of people that were surrounding a person on the ground. They looked like they were going into shock because their mate or friend or whatever got hit. He would approach them and say "is he/she hit? I'm a ems tech. Show me where they are hit so I can help." And then he would proceed to do nothing or shake them like I previously mentioned. I remember him even doing it to single people that were in the process of dying. He was playing with dead and dying people.

He kept on filming never showing his face while he played with some bloody people while they were dying or had died recently.

I was on a phone so I never thought of screenshots or recording or anything similar. I've always wondered if anyone else out there see the odd shit this guy was doing.

Imagine seeing your wife getting shot and some fuck face comes up and says "I'm here to help" then just proceeds to kinda grope and shake her body.

Crazy fucking world.

If anyone else seen this, please post. Stream wasn't up long, maybe minutes at most. Just enough to see this dude run around to maybe 6 or 7 people.

Fuck you if you don't believe me but I promise it happened.

All this thing does is create a random number and slap it into a filename that has the structure used by default in a few different digital cameras.
Camera types and filename structure
"dcp#####.jpg" - Kodak, range of 0 to 4000
"dsc#####.jpg" - Nikon, range of 0 to 4000
"dscn####.jpg" - Nikon, range of 0 to 4000
"mvc-###.jpg" - Sony Mavica
"mvc#####.jpg" - Sony Mavica
"P101####.jpg" - Olympus, Using default camera date of 101
"PMDD####.jpg" - Olympus, M is in hex from 1 to c, DD is 01-31
"IMG_###.jpg" - Some other camera
"IMAG####.jpg" - RCA and Samsung
"1##-####.jpg" - Canon 1TH-TH## thousands, hundreds
"1##-####_IMG.jpg" - Alternate Canon name. MUCH thanks to Donald
"IMG_####.jpg" - Canon
"_MG_####.jpg" - Canon raw conversion. Thanks to Ira
"dscf####.jpg" - Fuji Finepix
"pdrm####.jpg" - Toshiba PDR
"IM######.jpg" - HP Photosmart
"EX######.jpg" - HP Photosmart timelapse?
"DC####S.jpg" - Kodak DC-40,50,120 S is (L)arge, (M)eduim, (S)mall. Thanks to Pholph
"pict####.jpg" - Minolta Dimage. Thanks to Bram
"P#######.JPG" - Kodak DC290. Thanks to Peter
"MMDD####.JPG" - Casio QV3000 and QV4000. Thanks to Fabian
"YYMDD###.JPG" - Casio QV7000 - M is hex. Thanks to Kimble
"IMGP####.JPG" - Pentax Optio S. Thanks to Matthew
"PANA####.JPG" - Panasonic video camera stills. Thanks to DeAnne
"IMG_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS.JPG" - HTC Desire Z (AKA Tmobile G2). Thanks to anonymously vociferous

> Please be careful though. this is basically a form of very random chaos magick, and what you find may be meaningful to you or fuck you up. happy randonauting!

To create and to change public opinion it is necessary to understand human motives, to know what special interests are represented by a given population, and to realize the function and limitations of the physical organs of approach to the public, such as the radio, the platform, the movie, the letter, the newspaper, etc. If the general principles of swaying public opinion are understood, a technique can be developed which, with the correct appraisal of the specific problem and the specific audience, can and has been used effectively in such widely different situations as changing the attitudes of whites toward Negroes in America, changing the buying habits of American women from felt hats to velvet, silk, and straw hats, changing the impression which the American electorate has of its President, introducing new musical instruments, and a variety of others. Back in '10 or '11 I was big into EVE Online, and I was a part of some corp that's probably disbanded by now, I think they were called something like "re3fer" and the joke about the corp was that they were all stoners or whatever. I was a newbie to EVE, fuck I'd still say I dont know shit about it all these years later, but when I joined the leader pointed me towards a guide on mining resources, because the guild was in desperate need of miners or whatever.

The guide was on some shitty website that looked like it was from the 90s, and the formatting was pretty plain and generic. Black background with white dots and white text, headings in yellow and underlined. The front page was a fucking rat's nest of hyperlinks, i could feel my eyes glazing over as I read through them but i just ctrl + F'd for anything about mining and started reading the first guide i could find on it.

The mining page had the same formatting but every word on the page was underlined. I quickly picked up on the fact this was because they were all hyperlinks. Every. Single. Word. I tried a handful, clicking on the word "mining" and other random words, most of the time they brought me to a dead link that was just gibberish "like https:\\8888A8A8S8S88A88A8S8A8.com," or to the definition of the word. Occasionally as I read through the word vomit before me I'd click on words to see if the hyperlink lead anywhere. Finally, at the end of the guide, one of the words actually did lead to something.

cont.

>>33757040
Modern sleep routines are bullshit that maximize output per worker unit. There is a reason why they call you a "human resource".

Healthy sleep looks like the following:
>sleep when you feel tired
>nap in the middle/hottest part of the day
>split nightly sleep into two halves
>avoid artificial light sources
>shift the "hours" when you sleep depending on seasons (more in winter, less in summer)

This is how people slept before artificial lighting when they weren't trained to be factory workers:
>wake up with the sunrise / animals
>do daily chores/work until around noon (local time)
>have first large meal of the day
>sleep/nap until about 3-5pm depending on season
>do afternoon chores / work
>have second meal of the day / snack
>spend time with group
>go to sleep when sun sets - few hours after sun set depending on season
>wake-up around midnight-3am and do nightly chores / work / routine for 1-2 hours
>go back to bed until sun rise
Rinse and repeat. Note that candle light/fire is okay because it's a natural part of the environment. It doesn't screw up your body's processes like artificial lighting. In other words it doesn't trick your body into thinking the sun is out.

Any other routine is just an adaptation to modern factory / office work schedule. Which is horrible for your over all health. People slept the way I'm describing for 100s of thousands of years (perhaps millions) before the industrial revolution. You feel like shit because they're working you to death.
